Table.Name: Course
Table.Command: select course_name from course order by cast(course_name as varchar(50))

Table.Name: Student_grade
Table.Command: select last_name, first_name, grade from Student_grade join Course on Course.course_id = Student_grade.course_id join Student on Student.student_id = Student_grade.student_id where cast(course_name as varchar(50)) = @courseName

select grade from Student_grade join Course on Course.course_id = Student_grade.course_id join Student on Student.student_id = Student_grade.student_id where cast(course_name as varchar(50)) = @courseName and cast(last_name as varchar(50)) = @lastName

if not exists ( select 1 from Student_grade join Course on Course.course_id = Student_grade.course_id join Student on Student.student_id = Student_grade.student_id where cast(last_name as varchar(50)) = @lastName and cast(course_name as varchar(50)) = @courseName ) begin insert into Student_grade (student_id, course_id, grade) values ( (select student_id from Student where cast(last_name as varchar(50)) = @lastName), (select course_id from Course where cast(course_name as varchar(50)) = @courseName), @grade ) end else begin update Student_grade set grade = @grade where student_id = (select student_id from Student where cast(last_name as varchar(50)) = @lastName) and course_id = (select course_id from Course where cast(course_name as varchar(50)) = @courseName) end
